name: High Above
description:
*Only playable on Android*

In this mobile game play as Professor Waterbear and discover the interactions among the wildlife on trees!There is currently one tree to explore.

*Hey guys we noticed some problems that came back when we redownload our repository, so this isnt what we wanted to present for the game ;(. We will be updating asap with the stuff we did have but its gonna take a bit please be patient. We are sincerely sorry if this ruined your experience. Note: missing is some dialogue

We are planning to update around May 7th with a new interaction and possible level!

Don't forget to play with sound! 

Follow us on Twitter: HighAboveGame

Best, MadBot Games LLC
